title: Building a {distil} website
description: How did I build this website?
contents:
As my first blogpost, I am going to list here all the resources that I used when building this website. So, if you are new to R markdown or distil, I hope this post will be helpful. I am also new to both, maybe now a bit more comfortable with markdown after some projects. Good think is that there are many people who have shared their experience and are willing to teach those like us.
I first heard of distil on Twitter. What do you do when you hear about anything new? You google or youtube? That is what I did too! I ended up in Lisa Lendwayâ€™s website which by the way she built with distil; and there is also a Youtube video. This was already good enough to set up my webpage over night!
Next step for me was to check example websites. I am sure by googling a bit more, one can find many other example websites built with distil that provide code publicly. One of this sources is definitely Open Source Football.
I am still constructing my website, thus this blog will be updated constantly.
